A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was the most disappointing Star Wars film to date. Totally unsatisfied with where they took the franchise and how they mocked Luke and the fans who love Star Wars. Pretty much everything great about Star Wars they threw out the window\, replaced by terrible cringey humor and twilight-esque love scenes. This will be the last money I ever give to see a Star Wars film. Such a shame. RIP Star Wars 1977-2017. Even 2017 ruined Star Wars... :(
